Author: Fabien Pfaender (方骏祥)

Fabien is a data scientist, visualization researcher and city enthousiast. He loves programming things as much as exploring Humanities. When not reading weird fantasy or Sci-Fi novel, he embraces the vibrant life of Shanghai.

Complexcity Lab is a collaboration between french Université de Technologie Group and Shanghai University
